letters.description: Assess the cranial rhythmic impulse and the quality of cerebrospinal fluid flow within the system.
Facilitate the gentle release of myofascial and dural restrictions through non-invasive manual techniques.
Employ tactile sensitivity and therapeutic presence to monitor subtle physiological shifts and tissue needs.
Induce a therapeutic state of physiological pause to trigger the body's innate self-correction mechanisms.
Restore systemic homeostasis and achieve functional balance within the central nervous system.
